model.name: Blossom Stool Metal By Tokujin Yoshioka
model.disambiguatingDescription: Impeccable House craftsmanship and architectural elegance define this Blossom Stool Metal By Tokujin Yoshioka. It is designed by the world-renowned Japanese artist and features a petal-like shape inspired by the iconic Monogram Flower.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Diameter: 17.3 inches/44 cm
  • Height: 18.1 inches/46 cm
  • Weight: 220.5 pounds/100 kg
  • 80% carbon fiber, 10% glass fiber, 10% lacquer painting
  • LV Initials at bottom
  • Limited edition of 300 pieces

model.name: Blossom Stool Metal By Tokujin Yoshioka
model.disambiguatingDescription: The versatile Japanese designer Tokujin Yoshioka has created a metal version of his Blossom Stool for the Objets Nomades collection. The aluminum “petals” reminiscent of Louis Vuitton’s historic Monogram Flower, are polished smooth and plated with gold, bronze or chrome, creating an impression of endless reflection and movement. In an exclusive edition of 12 per color, this stool makes a brilliant addition to any décor – or collection.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• H 18.1 inches x Ø 17.3 inches
  • From the Objets Nomades collection
  • Weight: 10 kg
  • Pale gold-plated aluminum
  • Max. capacity: 100 kg
  • Limited edition of 12 per color
  • Made in Italy

model.name: Blossom Stool By Tokujin Yoshioka
model.disambiguatingDescription: An innovator in art, architecture and design, Tokujin Yoshioka explored his favorite theme of natural forms in the Blossom Stool for the Objets Nomades collection. Four ply wood “petals” lined with soft calfskin rise up in an eye-catching swirl that echoes the shape of Louis Vuitton’s Monogram Flower.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• H 18.1 inches x Ø 17.3 inches
  • From the Objets Nomades collection
  • Weight: 6 kg
  • St Red
  • Ash wood and calfskin
  • Refined piping in the edges
  • Extra-strong multi-layer plywood
  • Brass base and logo
  • Max. capacity: 100 kg
  • Limited edition of 1000 per color
  • Made in Italy
